supported browsers: Supported browsers: Safari, Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera. Supported devices: PC, Laptop, Tablet, Mobile (iOS/Android). Recommended browser: Latest Chrome or Edge.
browsers: Use Safari, Firefox, Chrome, Edge, or Opera. Recommended: Chrome or Edge.
login failing: Common causes: 1) Wrong URL (Training vs Live), 2) Case-sensitive password, 3) Caps Lock on, 4) Account locked after 5 failed attempts. Solution: Use Password Reset or contact Help Desk.
why is my login failing: Common causes: Wrong URL, Case-sensitive password, Caps Lock on, or Account locked. Solution: Use Password Reset or contact Help Desk.
reset password: Steps: 1) Click 'Forgot your password?' 2) Enter email (username) 3) Click Reset 4) Check email for reset link (valid for 30 minutes) 5) Set new password (min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number) 6) Log in.
did not receive reset email: Check Spam/Junk folder. Wait 2–3 minutes. Ensure email matches your PIMIS profile. Still missing? Raise a Help Desk ticket.
no reset email: Check Spam, wait a few minutes, confirm email is correct, or raise a Help Desk ticket.
create project concept note: Steps to create PCN: Create → Fill details → Save → Upload → Submit → Forward/Return.
pcn: PCN steps: Create → Fill details → Save → Upload → Submit → Forward/Return.
pre-feasibility: Steps for Pre-Feasibility: Create Pre-Feasibility → Fill details → Save → Upload → Submit → Forward/Return.
create pre-feasibility: Create Pre-Feasibility → Fill details → Save → Upload → Submit → Forward/Return.
feasibility study: Steps for Feasibility Study: Create Feasibility → Detailed analysis (economic, social, financial) → Save → Upload → Submit → Approve/Reject.
create feasibility study: Steps: Create Feasibility → Do detailed analysis → Save → Upload → Submit → Approve/Reject.
project stay in pipeline: Approved PCNs stay awaiting funding. They are auto-moved after approval.
save and forward pcn: You cannot Save & Forward if mandatory fields are not filled. Ensure all required fields are completed.
mandatory fields: Fill all mandatory fields before Save & Forward.
dashboard show: Dashboard shows: Total Projects, Pending Actions (PCNs, Feasibility, Budgets), Budget Summary (KES), Progress Charts (pie, bar), Alerts & Notifications.
menu options missing: Menu visibility is based on Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). MDAs see their projects, counties see county projects.
why dont i see menu options: Role-Based Access Control. Access depends on your assigned role.
